attributes.action: Reverse the recent tax raid on small businesses and maintain the Small Business Corporation tax rate at 19%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Small businesses are the backbone of the economy and are being run into the ground by this greedy government.  They are being punished for the government's mishandling of the economy.  Maintain the rate at 19% and give small businesses room to grow and employ more people.
